* 用 GLOG 替换了 protobuf 自己定义的 GOOGLE_LOG

2017/04/24 protoc-2.6.1 support 'move'
2017/05/02 protoc-2.6.1 support 'lazy parsing'
2017/05/15 protoc-2.6.1 fix reflection processing for lazy field
2018/07/10 protoc-3.4.1 --direct_dependencies well known protos
